so cynical aren't I Corey come on up
here and talk us about what's going on
this summer what do we got planned good
morning Faith Bible so as Rob mentioned
my name's Cory Garner uh and for those
that do not know my wife and I Lauren
have been leading a Ministry called
faithbuilders over the last number of
years here at Faith uh and so over the
years the ministry's grown quite a bit
um but really the the culmination of
what we do is a week-long mission trip
to Kentucky to make homes warmer safer
and drier through various repair
projects home construction efforts and
so over the last four years we've had
114 Faithful Servants from Faith Bible
stepping out of their comfort zones to
support this ministry and these uh
mission week-long mission trips we
served 21 different families in the
Kentucky and West Virginia area and we
served five local families here at Faith
Bible Church along with just wrapping up
a project at CF uh which was big than we
expected um but we got that done at the
end of this year so uh really good work
going on on this ministry um and so for
the ministry we have three specific
Focus areas we really try to hit on
through the ministry through the trips
first is creating a servant's heart and
really the goal uh for the ministry for
creating a servant's heart is
specifically with our youth we really
try to tailor this trip around our youth
to get our youth involved put their
faith into action while they have a team
of support a team team of leaders
helping them encouraging them teaching
them all throughout this ministry and so
um we really want to focus on the youth
and so they're we we've ranged from 12
up to 14 as the minimum age limit but
it's really kid- dependent but if you
have any questions or want to talk about
is this a good opportunity for your
child please come see us we'll we'll be
happy to talk about that second is
building a community so strengthening
the body of Believers here at Faith
Bible Church uh but also building a
community with the communities we serve
and so we've been going to Paintsville
this will be our third year now so we're
really starting to build community with
the the organization we partner with the
families the staff members uh and that
really kind of culminate culminated last
year uh when we have such good
relationships with the organization but
now we have folks that went on the trip
sending letters to the families
continuing to stay in community
continuing to stay in fellowship with
those families we're serving
it's just really really awesome to see
and then finally you know while those
first two are important sharing the
gospel is the most important and so the
main goal of this ministry is to share
the gospel with everyone we encounter
whether it's again the staff members the
organization the families or just
community members we meet out when we go
out uh in the evenings and so we can
help meet these physical needs all day
we can make homes warmer safer and drier
but if we're not ministering to these
people in their spiritual needs then
we're not work we're working in in vain
and so everything we do on this trip is
intently focused on sharing God's word
and so what's next so this summer we are

through a Saturday it's
